scripts.start: yarn run contember:start-engine && yarn run client:generate && yarn contember:start-admin
scripts.build: yarn run ts:build && yarn run contember:build-admin "$0" && yarn run contember:build-api
scripts.deploy: yarn run build "$0" && docker compose run --no-deps contember-cli deploy "$@" --root
scripts.contember:start-engine: docker compose up --detach && yarn run contember migrations:execute --yes
